thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best hotel in Beijing!
thread.title_full: The best hotel in Beijing! - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Eohlin
title: The best hotel in Beijing!
text:
First of all - thank you for having us!
Me and my friend stayed for 4 nights this February and we felt so taking cared of! The resturant was perfect with both classical asian and western food and the room was amaaazing after a long day walking and sightseeing!
We are definitely coming back to this fantastic hotel!
